participants.name: Helenmarie Mendoza Slater, SPHR, SHRM-SCP
participants.title: Senior Human Resources Manager at Honeywell Aerospace

messages.message: I have been writing software for over 10 years.  I saw some job postings at Honeywell that looked really great.  Including one Senior Software Developer for .Net.  This is only of my expertise.  I am very interested in meeting more of your team as I am currently on the job hunt.  Would you have an interest in making sure the right department picks up my application?  I am happy to take a phone interview anytime next week!  Thank you for the quick connect back!
